title: raamaa ragukula
sahitya:
rAma raghukula jalanidhi sOma lOkAbhi rAma

anupallavi

 tAmara cUliki nainanu nI mahimalu teliya vashamA

caraNam 1

 sharaNAgat jana rakSaka surapAla mukhajita sudhAkara ninnu vibhISaNuDu sharaNana gAnE 
suramuni janavairi sahOdaruDanucunu nEncaka nI birudunu bogaDucu lankapura patiga jEsina shrI
   
caraNam 2

 sura pUjita pada nIdu vara rUpamu gana jAlaka girijA ripuhara shankara saumitri dharajAnila 
tanaya vibhAkara suta dAsa vadanAnuja bharatulu pogaDaga tommidi gUriki divya drSTincina
   
caraNam 3

 jalajAruNa caraNAsura jaladAshuga shrI raghukula tilakAdbhuta guNa shubhamulu gala tyAgarAja 
kula pAvana kaliyuga manujulakunu nI tArakamu niDala nEtruni cEtanu vinula balkanugA jEsina
